title: SysDirRead (Function)
text:
FUNCTION SysDirRead : RTS_IEC_RESULT
Read next directory entry. Writes the entry in pszDirEntry.

rows.Name: SysDirRead
rows.Comment: Returns the runtime system error code (see CmpErrors.library)ERR_OK: Entry could be readERR_END_OF_OBJECT: If end of directory list was reachedERR_PARAMETER: If one of the parameters is invalidERR_BUFFERSIZE: If iMaxDirEntry is too short to get the complete directory entry stringNoteTypically after errorERR_BUFFERSIZE, the dir-handle is set to the next entry, so this entry will be missed!

rows.Name: hDir
rows.Comment: Handle to directory opened with SysDirOpen

rows.Name: diMaxDirEntry
rows.Comment: OUT_PARAMETER: Max number of bytes to write in pszDirEntry

rows:
OUT_PARAMETER: Directory information
NOTE: Can be 0 (so only directory name is provided in pszDirEntry)
